languages.text: "Внимайте, дабы не свершить грех производственной аварии! Прежде чем длань на рычаг наложить, надлежит восхвалить Омниссию трижды. Рычаг давить надобно уверенно и равномерно, ибо дух машины расторопности не терпит..."

"Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."
languages.original_text: "Внимайте, дабы не свершить грех производственной аварии! Прежде чем длань на рычаг наложить, надлежит восхвалить Омниссию трижды. Рычаг давить надобно уверенно и равномерно, ибо дух машины расторопности не терпит..."

traits.locale_text: "Heed these words, and commit not the wrong of operation failure! Lay a hand on the lever, but not until having offered three praises to the Omnissiah. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

"Heed these words, and commit not the wrong of operation failure! Lay a hand on the lever, but not until having offered three praises to the Omnissiah. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

"Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your land upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

"Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your land upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

"Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

"Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

languages.text: «¡Escuchad estas palabras y evitad la transgresión del accidente industrial! Alabad al Omnissiah tres veces, y solo entonces debéis colocar la mano sobre la palanca. Tirad con confianza y sin fuerza excesiva, pues el espíritu máquina no tolera la impaciencia...».
languages.original_text: "Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Escuchad estas palabras y evitad la transgresión del accidente industrial! Alabad al Omnissiah tres veces, y solo entonces debéis colocar la mano sobre la palanca. Tirad con confianza y sin fuerza excesiva, pues el espíritu máquina no tolera la impaciencia...».

languages.text: 「その言葉に耳を傾け、労働災害の罪を犯してはならない！万機神の神を三度讃え、それからレバーに手を添えるのだ。自信と自制を込めてレバーを引け。機械精霊は急ぐことは好まない…」
languages.original_text: "Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

traits.locale_text: 「その言葉に耳を傾け、労働災害の罪を犯してはならない！万機神の神を三度讃え、それからレバーに手を添えるのだ。自信と自制を込めてレバーを引け。機械精霊は急ぐことは好まない…」

languages.text: “仔细听好我说的话，不要引发机械事故！首先，赞美欧姆尼塞亚三次，之后把手放在拉杆上。拉拉杆的时候要充满信心，以克制的态度拉动，因为机魂容不得一丝匆忙……”
languages.original_text: "Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

traits.locale_text: “仔细听好我说的话，不要引发机械事故！首先，赞美欧姆尼塞亚三次，之后把手放在拉杆上。拉拉杆的时候要充满信心，以克制的态度拉动，因为机魂容不得一丝匆忙……”

languages.text: "Höret auf diese Worte, und begehet nicht den Fehltritt des industriellen Unfalls! Preiset den Omnissiah dreifach und leget erst dann die Hand auf den Hebel. Ziehet den Hebel selbstbewusst und beherrscht, denn der Maschinengeist duldet keine Hast ..."
languages.original_text: "Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

traits.locale_text: "Höret auf diese Worte, und begehet nicht den Fehltritt des industriellen Unfalls! Preiset den Omnissiah dreifach und leget erst dann die Hand auf den Hebel. Ziehet den Hebel selbstbewusst und beherrscht, denn der Maschinengeist duldet keine Hast ..."

languages.text: « Écoutez ces paroles, et gardez-vous de commettre le crime d'incident industriel ! Louez trois fois l'Omnimessie, et alors seulement, posez votre main sur le levier. Actionnez-le avec assurance et retenue, car l'esprit de la machine ne tolère pas l'impatience... »
languages.original_text: "Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez ces paroles, et gardez-vous de commettre le crime d'incident industriel ! Louez trois fois l'Omnimessie, et alors seulement, posez votre main sur le levier. Actionnez-le avec assurance et retenue, car l'esprit de la machine ne tolère pas l'impatience... »

languages.text: "Bu sözlere kulak verin ve sınai kaza ihlali yapmayın! Hermesih'e üç kere şükürlerinizi sunun. Ancak o zaman elinizi kolun üzerine getirebilirsiniz. Kolu itimatla ve itidalle çekin. Zira makine ruhu, ivediliğe müsamaha göstermez..."
languages.original_text: "Heed these words, and commit not the transgression of industrial accident! Praise the Omnissiah thrice, and only then lay your hand upon the lever. Pull the lever with confidence and restraint, for the machine spirit tolerates no haste..."
